meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery was a flukier event than anyone expected.
meanings.sent2: She felt flukier than usual when she found a four-leaf clover.
meanings.sent3: His flukier streak made his friends joke that he must have a lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The flukier turn of events left everyone in awe of his good fortune.
meanings.sent5: The flukier outcome of the game was like a dream come true for the team.

meanings.definition: Characterized by good luck or fortune
meanings.sent1: The flukier circumstances led to an unexpected promotion at work.
meanings.sent2: Their flukier encounter at the cafe turned into a lifelong friendship.
meanings.sent3: The flukier weather on their wedding day was seen as a sign of good luck.
meanings.sent4: Her flukier decisions always seemed to lead to positive outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The flukier events of the day made it feel like a fairy tale come to life.
